cdse-s3.title: Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem S3
cdse-s3.description: This endpoint provides access to EO data which is stored on the object storage of both CloudFerro Cloud and OpenTelekom Cloud (OTC). See the [documentation](https://documentation.dataspace.copernicus.eu/APIs/S3.html) for more information, including how to get credentials.

creodias-s3.title: CREODIAS S3
creodias-s3.description: Comprehensive Earth Observation Data (EODATA) archive offered by CREODIAS as a commercial part of CDSE, designed to provide users with access to a vast repository of satellite data without predefined quota limits.

links.title: Product history record from the CDSE traceability service

measurement.title: Standard Measurement Data Set

altitude.description: center of mass altitude above the reference ellipsoid

altitude_rate.description: center of mass altitude rate with respect to the reference ellipsoid

altitude_rate_mean_sea_surface.description: center of mass altitude rate with respect to the mean sea surface

amr_wet_tropo_cor_qual.description: quality flag for the AMR radiometer wet troposphere correction

angle_of_approach_to_coast.description: angle of approach to the coast

climato_use_flag.description: flag indicating the use of climatological values for the computation of sigma0 atmospheric attenuation

dac_type_flag.description: flag indicating the type of dynamic atmospheric correction files used

delta_ellipsoid_tp_wgs84.description: height difference between TOPEX and WGS84 reference ellipsoids

iono_cor_alt_filtered_mle3.description: altimeter smoothed ionospheric correction from MLE3

iono_cor_alt_filtered_nr.description: altimeter smoothed ionospheric correction from the numerical ocean retracker

iono_cor_alt_nr.description: altimeter ionospheric correction from the numerical ocean retracker

load_tide_sol1.description: load tide height for geocentric ocean tide solution 1 (GOT4.10)

load_tide_sol2.description: load tide height for geocentric ocean tide solution 2 (FES2014)

manoeuvre_flag.description: flag indicating whether the satellite is in a manoeuvre

mean_sea_surface_sol1.description: mean sea surface height solution 1 (CNES-CLS15) above the reference ellipsoid

mean_sea_surface_sol1_qual.description: mean sea surface solution 1 interpolation flag

mean_sea_surface_sol2.description: mean sea surface height solution 2 (DTU18) above reference ellipsoid

mean_sea_surface_sol2_qual.description: mean sea surface solution 2 interpolation flag

mean_swell_wave_direction_from.description: mean swell wave direction from MFWAM

mean_swell_wave_period.description: spectral moments (1,0) swell wave period from MFWAM

mean_wave_direction_from.description: mean wave direction from (Mdir) from MFWAM

mean_wave_period_t02.description: spectral moments (0,2) wave period (Tm02) from MFWAM

meteo_map_availability_flag.description: flag indicating the meteo maps availability

model_dry_tropo_cor_measurement_altitude.description: model dry tropospheric correction at measurement altitude

model_dry_tropo_cor_zero_altitude.description: model dry tropospheric correction at zero altitude

model_wet_tropo_cor_measurement_altitude.description: model wet tropospheric correction at measurement altitude

model_wet_tropo_cor_zero_altitude.description: model wet tropospheric correction at zero altitude

ocean_tide_non_eq.description: non-equilibrium long-period geocentric ocean tide height

off_nadir_pitch_angle_pf.description: off-nadir pitch angle measured by the platform

off_nadir_roll_angle_pf.description: off-nadir roll angle measured by the platform

off_nadir_yaw_angle_pf.description: off-nadir yaw angle measured by the platform

pass_direction_flag.description: flag indicating whether pass is ascending or descending

pole_tide.description: sea surface height amplitude due to the pole tide

rad_cloud_liquid_water_qual.description: quality flag for the radiometer cloud liquid water content

rad_tb_187.description: radiometer equalized brightness temperature at 18.7 GHz

rad_tb_187_qual.description: quality flag for the 18.7 GHz equalized brightness temperature

rad_tb_238.description: radiometer equalized brightness temperature at 23.8 GHz

rad_tb_238_qual.description: quality flag for the 23.8 GHz equalized brightness temperature

rad_tb_340.description: radiometer equalized brightness temperature at 34.0 GHz

rad_tb_340_qual.description: quality flag for the 34.0 GHz equalized brightness temperature

rad_water_vapor_qual.description: quality flag for the radiometer water vapor content

rad_wet_tropo_cor_qual.description: quality flag for the radiometer wet troposphere correction

rad_wind_speed_qual.description: quality flag for the radiometer wind speed

rain_attenuation_nr.description: rain attenuation for Ku-band (numerical ocean retracker)

rain_flag_nr.description: altimeter rain flag from the numerical ocean retracker

significant_swell_wave_height.description: modelled spectral significant swell wave height from MFWAM

significant_wave_height.description: modelled spectral significant wave height (Hm0) from MFWAM

wind_speed_alt_mle3.description: altimeter wind speed from MLE3 measurements

wind_speed_alt_nr.description: altimeter wind speed from the numerical ocean retracker measurements

wind_speed_mod_u.description: U component of the model wind vector at the altimeter time tag

wind_speed_mod_v.description: V component of the model wind vector at the altimeter time tag

atm_cor_sig0.description: two-way atmospheric attenuation correction on altimeter backscatter coefficient

measurement.description: The standard data file includes 1 Hz and 20 Hz measurements for the Ku-band as well as geophysical corrections at 1 Hz and some at 20 Hz.
